A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The script appears to have been written by the same individuals who came up with the absurd Bechdel test... And women in fridges. 


Every idea a male has is a disaster. And they men apparently should cover themselves up whenever a woman comes barging into their room. The only male who has an idea that works is a whiny 50 year old millennial who can't accept the failure and learn from it.

If a movie had come out that treated women the same way it would have been panned by critics instead of lauded by them.
